PageText.pText: We need to include the math.h header file for using mathematical functions. Following are the mathematical functions included in math library.

• cos(double radian);
  • sin(double radian);
  • tan(double radian);
  • fabs(double val);
  • fmod(double val1, double val2);
  • exp(double val);
  • log(double val);
  • log10(double val);
  • square(double val);
  • pow(double base, double power);
